dns_server.description: The DNS server where the zone is hosted.

password.description: The password to connect to AD.

ssh_port.description: The SSH server port to connect to.

ssh_server.description: The SSH server to connect to.

hostname_alias.description: If record type is set to CNAME, this is a mandatory field. Specify the hostname you wish the record to point to.

ipv4_address.description: If record type is set to A, this is a mandatory field. Specify the IP address you wish the record to point to.

ptr_domainname.description: If record type is set to PTR, this is a mandatory field. Specify the hostname you wish the record to point to.

record_name.description: Value for the record, which will be created.

record_type.description: Type of the record, currently only supporting A, PTR, CNAME types.

zone_name.description: Name of the zone where the DNS record will be created/managed.

block.description: Resource representing a single DNS record entry
